name: Cambridge Chair
details: The Cambridge chair is seriously stylish as well as comfy. With hints of Ercol design mixed with top quality waxed aniline leather and metal and wood framing, gives the Cambridge a luxurious sit as well as a classic look.

name: Sidney Sofa
details: Our Sidney range combines timeless classic design, with a supportive seat interior for those who prefer a slightly firmer sit. Gently curved arms are bolstered with a cushion for added comfort. Available in huge range of fabrics, this range looks stunning in a velvet.

name: Hailey Sofa
details: The Hailey range is one of our most comfy yet! Designed with luxuriously deep and soft yet supportive seat and back cushions, it also comes with a huge bolster cushion on each arm, which makes it perfect for those who like to snuggle down for the night. Available in a huge range of fabrics.

name: Berrington Sofa
details: The Berrington range is contemporary retro at its finest and its compact design is perfect for those smaller spaces. Features a button back and bolster cushions and has the optional extra of a headrest for added head support. This range is supremely comfortable and looks stunning in any of our velvet fabrics.

name: Granville Sofa
details: Our modern take on the classic Chesterfield, the Granville has a tapered arm with a pleated overwrap and traditional buttoning across the inner arm and backrest. High density loose seat cushions and a sprung base give this design a supportive sit. You can make this truly bespoke by choosing either fabric or leather buttons, piping and panel combinations, in a huge choice of tweeds, wools, standard fabrics and leathers. In a hurry? Our standard Off The Peg Midnight Tweed version with brown aniline leather seat cushions is available on a shorter lead time.

name: Club Patchwork
details: The Patchwork range offers timeless chesterfield style with a 15 year guaranteed handmade solid wood frame. It is made using off cuts so is sold as seen, as each piece is truly unique, in a variety of luxurious soft Aniline leathers, british wools and Harris Tweeds, the  combinations are endless and totally one off. No one out there will ever have a sofa that will match yours!
